module.name: Core
module.changelog: *13.0.132* bump *13.0.131.29* Fixed the bulkhandler validation issue *13.0.131.28* FREEI-1481 Outbound Routes - move paging Notifications setting to the new tab *13.0.131.27* FREEPBX-21565 Call confirm does not work since updates *13.0.131.26* FREEPBX-21382 Alert-Info header unconfigurably passed through to trunk when forwarding *13.0.131.25* FREEPBX-21382 Alert-Info header unconfigurably passed through to trunk when forwarding *13.0.131.24* FREEI-1349 Add indication tones for Indonesia *13.0.131.23* FREEPBX-21437: optimized outbound route notification email script usage, FPBX13 changes *13.0.131.22* FREEI-1466 Activating sipstation trial account gives "Call to undefined function" whoops error and the screen freezes in FreePBX 13. *13.0.131.21* bump *13.0.131.20* FREEI-1284: added email notifications to Outbound Routes, FPBX13 changes *13.0.131.19* FREEI-1183 Contact User in PJSIP isn't setting the User part of the Contact Header *13.0.131.18* FREEI-1226 *13.0.131.17* FREEI-683 fixe attended transfer for pjsip extension *13.0.131.16* bump *13.0.131.15* FREEI-1086 Emergecy device creation *13.0.131.14* FREEPBX-21062 send connected line present in 13.22 *13.0.131.13* bump *13.0.131.12* FREEI-1073 FREEPBX-21000 sipstatation generated pjsip trunks broken in asterisk 15 *13.0.131.11* Connected line is not in the good place. *13.0.131.10* FREEPBX-20935 PJSIP trunks missing after modules updates *13.0.131.9* FREEI-1043 Backport setting to disable transport reload to 13 *13.0.131.8* FREEPBX-20441 FreePBX 13 to SNG7 update breaks calling *13.0.131.7* FREEI-683 Add (i) on dial option. Too many trouble for some providers. Need to find another way. *13.0.131.6* FREEI-683 Attended Transfers Using PJSIP not updating Original Caller ID *13.0.131.5* FREEPBX-18676 Webpage mentioned on the banner on top of the asterisk.conf Prep for launch *13.0.1alpha35* FREEPBX-9491 List specific destinations in inbound routes chart *13.0.1alpha34* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha33* FREEPBX-9459 Dialpattern Field Display Issues *13.0.1alpha32* FREEPBX-9461, FREEPBX-8823 Implement a few more features into PJSIP that were missing *13.0.1alpha31* Add tab scrolls to devices *13.0.1alpha30* Fixed: FREEPBX-9446, FREEPBX-9447, FREEPBX-9448, FREEPBX-9449, FREEPBX-9450, FREEPBX-9457 *13.0.1alpha29* When in readonly mode in advanced settings dont just hide the rows, dont even put them in the dom *13.0.1alpha28* FREEPBX-9439 After deleting extension, Quick Create thinks it still exists until reload *13.0.1alpha27* Move features from extension settings into the table *13.0.1alpha26* FREEPBX-9430 If user is empty don't return invalid data *13.0.1alpha25* Fixes: FREEPBX-9419, FREEPBX-9359, FREEPBX-9427, FREEPBX-9426, FREEPBX-9428, FREEPBX-9431 *13.0.1alpha24* FREEPBX-9419 Fixes to looping over invalid arrays *13.0.1alpha23* Looping issue *13.0.1alpha22* Fix advanced settings page display *13.0.1alpha21* FREEPBX-7280 Dynamically generate extensions.conf, FREEPBX-8324 Ensure dialparties calls ALL the pjsip endpoints, FREEPBX-8860 - Add PJSIP Header support to macro-dial and macro-dial-one, FREEPBX-9164 *13.0.1alpha20* Add missing sections back into admin *13.0.1alpha19* Clear cache when deleting things *13.0.1alpha18* Declare the correct namespace name *13.0.1alpha17* Return an array if empty not a null *13.0.1alpha16* Dynamic hints phase 1, core speed up improvements *13.0.1alpha15* add sorting, mass delete and fixes FREEPBX-9193 *13.0.1alpha14* wrap in quotes to prevent an invalid syntax error on transfer if no ringtimer set *13.0.1alpha13* Fix outbound CID issues and address FREEPBX-5894 On outbound calls, phones show outbound Caller ID, even when hidden flag is set *13.0.1alpha12* Fix outstanding bugs with javascript on the trunks page *13.0.1alpha11* FREEPBX-8929, FREEPBX-8930, FREEPBX-8974 Add additional settings to pjsip trunks, reorganize pjsip trunks, fix pjsip trunks so they work *13.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-8859 Add WSS Support to chan sip *13.0.1alpha9* Dont hard set UTF8 *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-8815 Ordering of allow/disallow in pjsip.endpoint.conf *13.0.1alpha7* FREEPBX-8966 no apply bar after quick create *13.0.1alpha6* FREEPBX-8965 fixed error in creating custom extensions, some virtual extension fixes as well *13.0.1alpha5* Prevent crash during upgrade *13.0.1alpha4* Added load ability for Asterisk Modules *13.0.1alpha3* Hide buttons in grid views on inbound routes and extensions, Adjust sip trunk labels, add confirmation to delete action in trunk grid. *13.0.1alpha2* Reskin.
